mapper.insert: insert into free_board(free_num, free_name, free_title, free_content,free_hit) values(free_num_seq.nextval, #{param1},#{param2},#{param3},0)
mapper.select: select free_num, free_title, free_name,free_content, free_date, free_hit from free_board where free_num = #{param1}
select free_num, free_title, free_name,free_content, free_date,free_hit from free_board where free_num = #{param1}
mapper.update: update free_board set free_name = #{param2}, free_title = #{param3}, free_content = #{param4} where free_num = #{param1}
update free_board set free_hit = free_hit + 1 where free_num = #{param1}
mapper.select: select free_num,free_title,free_name,free_date,free_hit from free_board where free_title like '%${value}%' or free_content like '%${value}%'
